entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @PressSec It's sad that we've lost 151k Americans to Covid, and counting. It is more "infuriating" that he was infected at an anti-mask cult rally, and that his rapid decline due to #Covid19 will be obfuscated by the GOP due to his age and previous conditions he had long since overcome.
